dialogue.detail: Oh, are you the daughter of that evil witch?
Yes, I am! Who are you?
I'm Cici, the daughter of Fairy.
I can't understand why people like you would be allowed to study there. You know, like father, like son.
I don't think the descendant of any villain will be any different. You’re a rude and evil devil just like your mother!
Ah~~~~ What have you done to me? Why do I have a devil tail? Oh, no!!!
